languages.text: {n}Воздух вокруг Идиры можно резать ножом. Она цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, разрешите-ка мозгами этого ублюдка стенку покрасить здесь и сейчас. Я аккуратно, вас почти не измажет".

traits.locale_text: {n}По воздуху вокруг Идиры словно проходит рябь. Она цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, разрешите этому ублюдку башку лопнуть здесь и сейчас. Я аккуратно, вас почти не измажет".

languages.text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."
languages.original_text: {n}Воздух вокруг Идиры можно резать ножом. Она цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, разрешите-ка мозгами этого ублюдка стенку покрасить здесь и сейчас. Я аккуратно, вас почти не измажет".

traits.locale_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick it can be sliced with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with the brains of this piece of work? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

{n}The air around Idira grows so thick it can be sliced with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with the brains of this piece of work? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

{n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

{n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

{n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉周围的空气变得无比稠密，甚至可以用刀子切开。她咬牙切齿地喃喃自语道。{/n}“舰长大人，你介意我用这个人渣的脑子来刷墙吗？我会尽量小心点，别把太多东西沾到你身上。”
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉周围的空气变得无比稠密，甚至可以用刀子切开。她咬牙切齿地喃喃自语道。{/n}“舰长大人，你介意我用这个人渣的脑子来刷墙吗？我会尽量小心点，别把太多东西沾到你身上。”

languages.text: {n}イディラを取り巻く空気が、ナイフで切り裂けそうなほどの厚みを帯びる。彼女は歯を食いしばって呟いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、この卑劣な男の脳を壁に塗りつけてやってもいいかしら？あなたには、かかりすぎないように気をつけるから」
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラを取り巻く空気が、ナイフで切り裂けそうなほどの厚みを帯びる。彼女は歯を食いしばって呟いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、この卑劣な男の脳を壁に塗りつけてやっても構わないかしら？あなたには、あまりかからないように気をつけるから」
{n}イディラを取り巻く空気が、ナイフで切り裂けそうなほどの厚みを帯びる。彼女は歯を食いしばって呟いた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、この卑劣な男の脳を壁に塗りつけてやってもいいかしら？あなたには、かかりすぎないように気をつけるから」

languages.text: {n}Die Luft um Idira wird so dick, dass man sie mit einem Messer schneiden könnte. Mit zusammengepressten Zähnen stößt sie hervor:{/n} "Lord Captain, dürfte ich die Wände mit dem Gehirn dieses Abschaums streichen? Ich wäre auch vorsichtig, damit Ihr nicht allzu viel abbekommt."
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Luft um Idira wird so dick, dass man sie mit einem Messer schneiden könnte. Mit zusammengepressten Zähnen stößt sie hervor:{/n} "Lord Captain, dürfte ich die Wände mit dem Gehirn dieses Abschaums streichen? Ich wäre auch vorsichtig, damit Ihr nicht allzu viel abbekommt."

languages.text: {n}L'air autour d'Idira s'épaissit tellement qu'il en devient presque tangible. Elle siffle entre ses dents :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, verriez-vous un inconvénient à ce que je repeigne les murs avec la cervelle de cette enflure ? Je veillerai à limiter les projections dans votre direction. »
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air autour d'Idira s'épaissit tellement qu'il en devient presque tangible. Elle siffle entre ses dents :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, verriez-vous un inconvénient à ce que je repeigne les murs avec la cervelle de cette enflure ? Je veillerai à limiter les projections dans votre direction. »

languages.text: {n}El aire que rodea a Idira se vuelve tan denso que podría cortarse con un cuchillo. Masculla entre dientes:{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿me permite decorar las paredes con el cerebro de esta escoria? Trataré de no salpicarle mucho».
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El aire que rodea a Idira se vuelve tan denso que podría cortarse con un cuchillo. Masculla entre dientes:{/n} «Lord Capitán, ¿me permite decorar las paredes con el cerebro de esta escoria? Trataré de no salpicarle mucho».

languages.text: {n}İdira'nın çevresindeki hava öyle yoğunlaşıyor ki bıçakla kesilebilir hâle geliyor. Dişlerinin arasından mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Bu pisliğin beynini duvarlara saçmamın sakıncası var mı Lord Kaptan? Senin üstüne çok bulaştırmam, merak etme."
languages.original_text: {n}The air around Idira grows so thick, one could cut it with a knife. She mutters through her teeth,{/n} "Lord Captain, do you mind letting me paint the walls with this scumbag's brains? I'll be careful not to get too much of it on you."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira'nın çevresindeki hava öyle yoğunlaşıyor ki bıçakla kesilebilir hâle geliyor. Dişlerinin arasından mırıldanıyor:{/n} "Bu pisliğin beynini duvarlara saçmamın sakıncası var mı Lord Kaptan? Senin üstüne çok bulaştırmam, merak etme."
